horsentp.display

Interface Displayable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DisplayLayer, ImageDisplay, SimpleDisplayablePhysicsPolygon

    public interface Displayable
    A common interface that tells the Displayer how to display something

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage render(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bImage, java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws itself to the image buffer The implementation of this method is a little wonky.
      void setDisplayLink(DisplayLink link)
      Passes a reference for the Displayable object to use.

    • Method Detail

      • render

        java.awt.image.BufferedImage render(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bImage,
                                  java.awt.Graphics2D g2d)
        Draws itself to the image buffer The implementation of this method is a little wonky. You must set "g2d" to the bImage's graphics using "getGraphics" on the bImage, and casting it Then you can use the Graphics2D object to draw onto the buffer When you finish drawing onto the image, then return the buffer that you were given
        Parameters:
        bImage - the reference to the image buffer to draw on
        g2d - a Graphics2D object to fill with the buffer
        Returns:
        the buffer that you were originally given

      • setDisplayLink

        void setDisplayLink(DisplayLink link)
        Passes a reference for the Displayable object to use. This is for when you have an object you want to draw, but don't actually want to put all of the draw code into that other object
        Parameters:
        link - the object that will be linked to this Displayable object
